document_name: National Strategy for Restoration of Ecosystems and Degraded Forest Lands (PROREST) ​​period 2021 - 2030
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PER/2021/PER-2021-01-01-National Strategy for Restoration of Ecosystems and Degraded Forest Lands (PROREST) ​​period 2021 - 2030_c93dabd30ac27240ae1e7ad51f3e3e47.pdf
document_description: This document establishes a programmatic and orientation tool for the management of the actions that are implemented in  affected territories, taking into account their diverse realities and socio-economic and biophysical contexts and the economic, social and environmental objectives.The strategy is in line with rules on restoration of ecosystems and degraded forest lands established under Ministerial Resolution 338- 2020-MIDAGRI.
